definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: escape (NH id.; Ph. in n.pr.; Ar. flt IV escape, Vulg. Ar. flt. ; OAram. [[פלט]] Pa. rescue, Targum [[פְּלַט]] Syr. plat.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. consec. [[וּפָֽלְטוּ]] Ez Eze 7:16 and (if) escapers of them escape).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: causat.: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יְפַלְּטֵם]]; 2 ms. [[תְּפַלֵּט]] Mic 6:14, etc.; Imv. ms. [[פַּלְּטָה]] Ps 17:13, etc.; Pt. sf. [[מְפַלְּטִי]] Ps 18:3 +;—

bring into security Mic 6:14; esp. of ´[[י]], deliver, c. acc. pers., Ps 22:5, Ps 22:9, Ps 31:2, Ps 37:40, Ps 71:2 (+ [[הִחִיל]]), Ps 82:4, Ps 91:14; + [[מִן]] from 2Sa 22:44 = Ps 18:44, Ps 18:49 ([[מוֹחִיא]] ‖ 2Sa 22:49), Ps 17:13, Ps 37:40, Ps 43:1, Ps 71:4; pt. c. sf.,my deliverer 2Sa 22:2 = Ps 18:3, Ps 40:18, Ps 70:6, Ps 144:2.
cause to escape, cast forth, of cow calving Job 21:10 (cf. [[[מָלַט]]]

definitions.title: Hiph.,
definitions.body: also Targum vomit out, and so palet.).
appar. intrans. be delivered, c. [[מִן]] Job 23:7, but dub.; Bu

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: (‘perh.’); LXX Du read [[מִשְׁפָּטִי]] as obj. (but elsewhere ´[[י]] subj. of

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: bring into security; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַפְלִיט]] Is 5:29 of Assyria, under fig. of lion, carrying off prey (opp. [[הִצִּיל]]); 2 ms. [[תַּפְלִיט]] Mic 6:l4 (cf.
